global_governance.escalation_policy: Failure at any section -> escalate to supervisor

validation_criteria.completeness: Minimum 70% of features must be present
validation_criteria.recency: Profile data must be < 30 days old for dynamic features

sections.description: Framework governing transformation of raw learner profiles into normalized feature vectors suitable for theory matching.

validation_criteria.coverage: At least one theory from each major cluster when applicable
validation_criteria.coherence: Selected theories must not fundamentally contradict
validation_criteria.personality_alignment: Consider Openness for constructivist, Conscientiousness for behaviorist

sections.description: Framework governing alignment of normalized learner profiles to pedagogical learning theories from a 64-theory database.

validation_criteria.internal_consistency: Dimensions should correlate with profile features
validation_criteria.face_validity: Dimension profile should match pedagogical intuition

sections.description: Framework governing generation of multi-dimensional cognitive footprints that guide scaffold architecture.

validation_criteria.minimum_clusters: At least 2 clusters must be represented
validation_criteria.maximum_clusters: No more than 5 clusters to avoid cognitive overload
validation_criteria.balance: No single cluster should exceed 60% of total weight

sections.description: Framework governing grouping of matched theories into coherent scaffold clusters with appropriate layering.

validation_criteria.completeness: Each layer must have theory basis and implementation notes
validation_criteria.alignment: Scaffold intensity must match learner's structure need
validation_criteria.coherence: Layers must build logically upon each other

sections.description: Framework governing production of actionable pedagogical scaffolds from theory clusters and cognitive dimensions.

validation_criteria.pass_condition: No hard conflicts, evidence â‰¥ threshold, context appropriate
validation_criteria.warning_condition: Soft conflicts present OR marginal evidence
validation_criteria.conflict_condition: Hard conflicts detected OR no evidence support

sections.description: Framework governing validation of pedagogical alignment between selected theories and learner profile evidence.

validation_criteria.context_fit: Parameters must respect ecological constraints from CLEA

sections.description: Framework governing fine-tuning of scaffold parameters based on learner capacity, context, and multimodal preferences.

validation_criteria.completeness: All downstream agents must have valid instruction sets
validation_criteria.consistency: Instruction sets must not contradict each other

sections.description: Framework governing packaging of pedagogical design specifications for downstream agent consumption with full traceability.
